title: Federal election gets underway in Skeena-Bulkley Valley
source_url: file://imports/Burns Lake Lakes District News Burns Lake Lakes District News 04_02_2025 1.pdf
excerpt: Candidates for the Skeena—Bulkley Valley have swung into gear for the 2025 federal election. Taylor Bachrach of the NDP is seeking re-election. He is facing off against Ellis Ross of the Conservative
content_html: Candidates for the Skeena—Bulkley Valley have swung into gear for the 2025 federal election. Taylor Bachrach of the NDP is seeking re-election. He is facing off against Ellis Ross of the Conservative Party of Canada, Catriona Wright of the Green Party of Canada, and Rod Taylor of the Christian Heritage Party of Canada. The Liberal Party of Canada did not provide information by press deadline about whether they are running a candidate in the riding. Ross, the Conservative candidate, is likely to win the riding, according to a predictive model published by political website 338Canada.
